thread.title: Lindenhurst mayor resigns, new one to be chosen Tuesday
thread.title_full: Lindenhurst mayor resigns, new one to be chosen Tuesday | Newsday

author: Denise M. Bonilla
title: Lindenhurst mayor resigns, new one to be chosen Tuesday
text:
Tom Brennan, here on March 5, 2016, resigned as mayor of Lindenhurst on Monday, Feb. 27, 2017. (Credit: /) 

Lindenhurst Mayor Tom Brennan has resigned, and a replacement will be chosen Tuesday at a special village trustee meeting.
Brennan was elected to his fourth term in March. He submitted a letter of resignation Monday, giving up the position as of Feb. 23. Brennan told a Newsday reporter in January that he was unsure whether he would be able to complete his term — which runs to March 2020 —...
